item.title: Barrows
item.dc:creator: @Olli3 Olli3
item.description:
@Olli3 wrote:

Look under case 132 , i think it is , and type in the Item ID for the barrows chest , then type in the co-ordinates of the place you want it to tele you to. I have no idea about how to give a random item tho
Also try this. (TUT FROM BORED. 100% HIM)

How To Make Portals Work,

First Open Client.Java And Search For
Code:

Case

Than Add Under A
Code:

Break:

Code:

case Portal Id: // Cw
teleportToX = XTELE;
teleportToY = YTELE;
sendMessage(“YOUR MESSAGE HERE!”);
sendMessage(“YOUR MESSAGE HERE!”);
sendMessage(“YOUR MESSAGE HERE!”);
break;

If You Want To Add Somthing If You Tele
Code:

Portal Id: // Cw
teleportToX = XTELE;
teleportToY = YTELE;
addItem(ID,Amount);
sendMessage(“YOUR MESSAGE HERE!”);
sendMessage(“YOUR MESSAGE HERE!”);
sendMessage(“YOUR MESSAGE HERE!”);
break;

Or If Its Only For Staff
Code:

case PortalId: // Admin Portal
if(playerRights == 2)
teleportToX = Xtele;
teleportToY = Ytele;
sendMessage(“you teleport to the admin area.”);
if(playerRights == 0)
sendMessage(“you have to be a Admin To enter this!”);
break;

If You Want To Add Skill Xp
Code:

case ID:
if(GoodDistance2(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 3)) {
if(actionTimer == 0)
{
sendMessage(“You Train Magic.”);
addSkillXP((750playerLevel[6]), 6);
addSkillXP((1500playerLevel[3]), 3);
actionTimer = 10;
setAnimation(811);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
}
break;

Somthing Like That.

Credits 100% BORED

item.title: Barrows
item.dc:creator: @lolplz lolplz
item.description:
@lolplz wrote:

Yes, but you’d have to fix the dostuff part, and make it tele you to a place and give you a random barrows item, which i’m not sure how to randomize that, gl! I’m finishing up my barrows right now, once you get all the keys, you open the chest, and it brings up an interface, you choose a barrows item, and wala! You have it!
